title: Lokubandara still with UNP?
content: Source: Lakbima News Rumour was rife that former speaker W.J.M.Lokubandara would join the UPFA , but when asked he denied such a move. The President’s media division said that W J M Lokubandara and his wife were among the distinguished persons who participated at yesterday’s SLFP working committee meeting that took place at the Bandarawela…
